titleStmt.title: A remonstrance of His Sacred Royal Majesty of Sweden, unfolding the grounds and causes whereby His said Majesty was constrained to continue the war brought on by the king and Kingdom of Denmark, after the peace was ratified at Roskild, but neither pursu'd nor duly observ'd by the Danes· Anno 1658.
titleStmt.author: Coyet, Peter Julius, 1618-1667.
Karl X, Gustaf, king of Sweden, 1622-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Wood for D. Pakeman ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed erroneously to Karl X, Gustaf, King of Sweden.
Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
